cards.name: Luke Skywalker
cards.bio: A young and hopeful hero destined for greatness.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Luke Skywalker with a lightsaber on Tatooine

cards.name: Princess Leia
cards.bio: A brave and resourceful leader in the Rebel Alliance.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Princess Leia in her white gown holding secret Death Star plans

cards.name: Han Solo
cards.bio: A charming rogue with a quick wit and a quicker blaster.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Han Solo with his blaster in the Millennium Falcon

cards.name: Chewbacca
cards.bio: A loyal Wookiee warrior and co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Chewbacca roaring, with a bowcaster on the Millennium Falcon

cards.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
cards.bio: A wise and powerful Jedi Master in hiding.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Obi-Wan Kenobi with a blue lightsaber, wearing Jedi robes

cards.name: R2-D2
cards.bio: A brave astromech droid carrying the Death Star plans.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: R2-D2 on the Death Star avoiding stormtroopers

cards.name: C-3PO
cards.bio: A protocol droid fluent in over six million forms of communication.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: C-3PO in the desert of Tatooine

cards.name: Darth Vader
cards.bio: A fearsome Sith Lord and enforcer of the Emperor's will.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Darth Vader with a red lightsaber aboard the Death Star

cards.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
cards.bio: A high-ranking officer in the Galactic Empire and commander of the Death Star.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Grand Moff Tarkin overseeing the Death Star operations

cards.name: Rebel Pilot
cards.bio: A courageous pilot of the Rebel Alliance, fighting against the Empire.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Rebel Pilot in an X-wing cockpit during the Battle of Yavin

cards.name: Darth Sidious
cards.bio: The dark Emperor of the Galactic Empire and mastermind behind its tyranny.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Emperor Palpatine with dark force lightning
